Updated November     pm



IUPs ZachKempahas been named the Mens Golfer of the Week by the Pennsylvania State Athletic Conference PSAC PERIOD

This is the second consecutive week that a Crimson Hawk has won the award. derek Baker claimed the honor in the previous week.Kempaand Baker are the only two golfers to have won the award this season PERIOD

At the Hal Hansen Invitational at Clarion Oaks Golf Course in Clarion Pa.Kempashot a twounder  tying for first place individually and leading the Hawks to a second overall finish.Kempais one of only two golfers to finish the tournament under par. in a playoff withSabastianBendsenof Davis  ElkinsKempafell after four holes PERIOD

Baker and teammate Jack Owen tied with RobertCoyneof Millersville for sixth place in the tournament each shooting a threeover  PERIOD

Also finishing in the top  for the Hawks was BrettGeiser who shot a sixover  PERIOD

The Hawks narrowly lost to West Chester University who claimed victory at the tournament PERIOD

IUPwill travel to West Lafayette Ohio for the River Greens Invitational Monday and Tuesday PERIOD
